message:
Thank you,   
of course the device driver has to support asynchronous I/O, but what about the Net Core implementation of the async call (I assume it is the BCL library in your image above)  
Do you agree that the .Net OS specific part is likely implemented in the sync manager of PAL in CoreCLR (or similar) as per this answer? [https://stackoverflow.com/a...](https://stackoverflow.com/a/45808571/6996876 "https://stackoverflow.com/a/45808571/6996876") Thanks again for your help!
